item.title: Gary Dauberman Tackling Spooky Video Game ‘The Medium’ (Exclusive)
item.description: The horror master and his Coin Operated banner aim to produce an adaptation of the game by Bloober Team.

item.title: CAA Literary Agent Kathleen Remington Launching New Management Venture (Exclusive)
item.description: The longtime agent began her career at ICM in 2003 as an intern and amassed an enviable list of big-name screenwriters over a 20-plus year career.
